metadata.title: CVE-2024-26824 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: algif_hash - Remove bogus SGL free on zero-length error pathWhen a zero-length message is hashed by algif_hash, and an erroris triggered, it tries to free an SG list that was never allocatedin the first place.  Fix this by not freeing the SG list on thezero-length error path.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
